Creating a Site Using Jekyll

10 Mar 2015

So I when I first started trying to make a blog I didnâ€™t realize how difficult it would actually be to find something that worked. No other free platform contained the features that I wanted.

Now Jekyll is no perfect solution, but it does provide a host of features and is much more open than any other option, which is why I opted to switch

Posts are written in Markdown which is a really handy markup language. Great for writing posts, but it does have a bit of a learning curve and takes some time to get used to.
